mapper.select: SELECT TRACKING_INFO_NUM trackingInfoNum, TRACKING_INFO_WHERE trackingInfoWhere, TRACKING_INFO_DATE trackingInfoDate, TRACKING_NUM trackingNum FROM TRACKING_INFO WHERE TRACKING_NUM = #{TRACKING_NUM} ORDER BY TRACKING_INFO_DATE ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRACKING_INFO VALUES ( TRACKING_INFO_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{trackingInfoWhere}, SYSDATE, #{trackingNum} )
